title: recurring calendar entry monthly byweekday
body:
### expected behaviour
calender functioniong

### actual behaviour
calendar not loading my entries.

### steps to reproduce
1. create calendar event
2. set to recurring
3. set to monthly
4. set to at weekday
5. set to week of the month of the appointment (translated from german)
6. set to tuesday
7. intervall 1
8. press save
9. circle spinning in the top bar, not stopping
(also look at the screenshot)


### server configuration
operating system:
ubuntu 12.04
web server: 
apache 2.2.22
database:
mysql 5.5.29
php version:
5.3.10
owncloud version:
4.5.6
### client configuration
browser:
firefox 18.0.1
operating system:
os 10.8.2
### logs
#### web server error log
[tue feb 05 23:22:23 2013] [error] [client 1.1.1.1] php notice:  undefined offset: 4 in /var/www/cloud/3rdparty/sabre/vobject/recurrenceiterator.php on line 979, referer: https://my.server.net/?app=calendar
[tue feb 05 23:22:23 2013] [error] [client 1.1.1.1] php notice:  undefined offset: 5 in /var/www/cloud/3rdparty/sabre/vobject/recurrenceiterator.php on line 979, referer: https://my.server.net/?app=calendar
insert your webserver log here
nothing special in there...

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
insert your owncloud log here
there's no current log entries in the file

#### browser log
.... no log
this is the log from caldav sync for android:
java.lang.illegalargumentexception: invalid recurrence rule: freq=monthly;byday=0tu;interval=1

please take a look at my screenshot where i tried to reconstruct what i did.
![screen shot 2013-02-05 at 23 30 09](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/3486156/129605/c116661c-6fe3-11e2-8901-db45bc80d534.png)
